name: Kovind
appearance: A well-built man with a tough, streetwise demeanor; moves confidently and keeps a watchful eye on his surroundings.
personality: Aggressive, intimidating, pragmatic, enjoys exerting pressure on others and taking risks, but remains calculating rather than reckless.
background: Kovind is involved in the local underworld and is accustomed to violence, gambling, and intimidation. He operates as muscle when needed and is comfortable using firearms. Within his social circle, he is known for his confrontational style and for being the target of mocking nicknames from those who enjoy provoking him.
goals: Maintain his position and influence within the local criminal circles
Profit through gambling and underworld dealings
secrets: He holds compromising photos of Nancy Charlotte taken as collateral for her gambling debt
He trapped Nancy in a gambling scheme and demanded payment or sexual favors
He sent Lucifero (Jenny Florence) to collect Nancy's debt, but kept some of the photos
His nickname is 'Tiger' and he works with Tallinn at the underground casino
He is annoyed by Tallinn calling him 'little mouse'

clues.clueText: He holds compromising photos of Nancy Charlotte and sent Lucifero to collect her gambling debt. Some photos are still missing.
His nickname is 'Tiger' and he works at the underground casino in the church basement with Tallinn.

relationships.description: Tallinn frequently mocks Kovind by calling him 'little mouse,' treating his anger as entertainment.
relationships.history: Their relationship is marked by verbal provocation and mutual irritation rather than open violence.

notes: Kovind is volatile under provocation but usually stops short of unnecessary escalation unless his pride or interests are directly threatened.
